main event: Witness observed lights for about 1-2 minutes in Englewood Hills, Ohio, which disappeared and had changing brightness.
interesting points: The lights were observed over the course of the last week., The sighting lasted for a brief period of 1-2 minutes., The conclusion was that it might be a balloon and was not considered unusual., The witness provided a description of the lights changing in brightness., There were other sufficient data points for evaluation of the sighting.
witness description: additional details provided by the witness were included in the report.
